primevc.gui.graphics.GraphicProperties

type
class
implements
IGraphicElement
Collection of a fill, border, layout and shape object. Object can fire an event when a property in one of these objects is changed.

Constructor

new(?layout : primevc.core.geom.IntRectangle, ?shape : primevc.gui.graphics.shapes.IGraphicShape, ?fill : IGraphicProperty, ?border : primevc.gui.graphics.borders.IBorder, ?borderRadius : primevc.core.geom.Corners)

Instance Variables

_oid(default,null) : Int

border(default,setBorder) : primevc.gui.graphics.borders.IBorder

borderRadius(default,setBorderRadius) : primevc.core.geom.Corners

changeEvent(default,null) : primevc.core.dispatcher.Signal1<Int>

Signal to notify other objects than IGraphicElement of changes within the shape.

fill(default,setFill) : IGraphicProperty

layout(default,setLayout) : primevc.core.geom.IntRectangle

listeners(default,null) : haxe.FastList_primevc_core_traits_IInvalidateListener

percentage(default,setPercentage) : Float

Percentage of the graphic-shape to draw (value between 0-1)

shape(default,setShape) : primevc.gui.graphics.shapes.IGraphicShape

Instance Methods

dispose() : Void

draw(target : primevc.gui.traits.IGraphicsOwner, ?useCoordinates : Bool) : Bool

parameters
target target in which the graphics will be drawn
useCoordinates Flag indicating if the draw method should also use the coordinates of the layoutclient. If a shape is directly drawn into a IGraphicsOwner element, this is not the case. If a shape is part of a composition of shapes, then the shape should respect the coordinates of the LayoutClient.

invalidate(change : Int) : Void

invalidateCall(changeFromOther : Int, sender : primevc.core.traits.IInvalidatable) : Void

inline isEmpty() : Bool
